Gantry Documentation and Guides in Italian to create professional Joomla Templates!

NOTE: This Particle was installed for Gantry.
If you want to install the Particle for a specific Gantry template, you must place the files as follows:

  • *.yaml => /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/particles
  • *.twig => /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/particles
  • *.js => /templates/[TEMPLATE]/custom/js
